title: r60 release fails all.bash on Lucid linux/amd64
body:
Works on my Ubuntu 10.04.1 machine at work, and my 10.04.2 laptop, but not my 10.04.3
machine at home?

$ hg clone -u release https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ r60-go

$ cd r60-go/src

$ hg identify
fd30c132d1bd (release-branch.r60) release/release.r60.1

$ uname -a
Linux ante 2.6.32-24-server #43-Ubuntu SMP Thu Sep 16 16:05:42 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux

$ cat /etc/lsb-release 
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=10.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=lucid
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS"

$ ./all.bash

--- cd ../test
fail: ./cmplxdivide1.go
fail: dwarf/z1.go
fail: dwarf/z10.go
fail: dwarf/z11.go
fail: dwarf/z12.go
fail: dwarf/z13.go
fail: dwarf/z14.go
fail: dwarf/z15.go
fail: dwarf/z16.go
fail: dwarf/z17.go
fail: dwarf/z18.go
fail: dwarf/z19.go
fail: dwarf/z2.go
fail: dwarf/z20.go
fail: dwarf/z3.go
fail: dwarf/z4.go
fail: dwarf/z5.go
fail: dwarf/z6.go
fail: dwarf/z7.go
fail: dwarf/z8.go
fail: dwarf/z9.go
fail: fixedbugs/bug364.go
19a20,21
